basics.name: Andrew Lewandowski

work.name: HPE Aruba Networks
work.summary: Presales engineering for commercial enterprise and SLED customers. Educating and demoing end customers on the latest from HPE Aruba!

work.name: High Point Networks
work.summary: Pre and post sales network and voice engineering for commercial and SLED customers. Worked with a multitude of systems, vendors, and products. Scripted out large network deployments.

work.name: Marco Technologies
work.summary: Implemented Mitel MiVoice Business solutions for customers with a heavy focus in Marco's offering of Unified Communications as a Service. Primarily worked on call center design and implementation.

awards.title: Medallion Scholarship
awards.summary: The Medallion scholarship is among the largest merit-based scholarship programs in American higher education and is valued at approximately $90,920 over the course of four years. Each year, WMU selects a cohort of up to 20 Medallion Scholars.
